text: Instructions: Please read and answer the following questions in relation to COVID-19 from the last 2 weeks.
Do you obtain news regarding covid-19 from Facebook?
Do you obtain news regarding covid-19 from Twitter?
Do you obtain news regarding covid-19 from Snapchat?
Do you obtain news regarding covid-19 from WhatsApp?
Do you obtain news regarding covid-19 from Instagram?
Do you check the government statistics regarding covid-19?
Do you share information regarding covid-19 on social media?
Do you rely on your family/friends to post about covid-19 for information?
Do you rely on mainstream news for information regarding covid-19?
Do you read published papers regarding covid-19?
